subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Mavericks and the Dallas Cowboys are collaborating to bring the N.B.A. All-Star Game to the new Cowboys stadium in 2010, and plenty of seats are available — more than 100,000.
snippet: The Dallas Mavericks and the Dallas Cowboys are collaborating to bring the N.B.A. All-Star Game to the new Cowboys stadium in 2010, and plenty of seats are available — more than 100,000.
